title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.59 - Cooling Towers; performance standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.59 - Cooling Towers; performance standards

State Regulations

The local health department shall maintain a program that ensures cooling towers are operated pursuant to the New York State Public Health Law and Subpart 4-1 of the State Sanitary Code (10 NYCRR Subpart
4-1
)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
40-2.59

Adopted

New

York State Register August 26, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 34, eff. 8/26/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
